channel.title: I get this error when i run compile-all.exe
channel.description:
Error when running compile-all.exe
i get this error when i run compile-all.exe
C:\Program Files\aryan>compile-Classes.bat 'javac is not recognised as an inter or external command, operable program or batch file press any key to continue . . .
what can i do to fix this please?

item.title: I get this error when i run compile-all.exe
item.dc:creator: @Magican45 Magican45
item.description:
@Magican45 wrote:

go to start->right click on my computer->propertys->Advanced Tab->Envirment Variables

Then click new (if you dont already have path in upper box)
and type in “path” in upper box for the new window

and in the lower box type in (assuming you have JDK 5.0 Update 6 for java)
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_06in;C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_06in”

then click ok

Then click new again(if you dont already have classpath in upper box)
and type in “classpath” in upper box for the new window

and in the lower box type in (assuming you have JDK 5.0 Update 6 for java)
“SET CLASSPATH=C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_06in;%CLASSPATH%;.”

NOTE: DO NOT INCLUDE THE " IN THE LOWER BOXES OR THE UPPER BOXES FOR NEW!!![br][size=1]Posted at: March 18, 2006, 09:39:17 pm[/size][hr]oh and its not .exe its .bat, if its .exe then its a virus/keylogger.

Read full topic
item.source: I get this error when i run compile-all.exe
